initialTitle: Web Designer and Front-end Developer since 2013. Worked for agencies and as a freelancer for companies in Bangladesh, in Asia.
focusTitle: Focus on designing user interfaces for websites and developing semantic, responsive and reusable code aiming for best performance on browsers and devices.
educationTitle: A programmer by education (graduated in Computer Science) and (interface) designer by heart. Also a blogger at jpedroribeiro.com, where several web related topics are written, from book reviews to how-to guides on development and design.
